MembershipRole.description: Resource representing a role within a Membership.

name.description:
MembershipRole in string format.

Currently supported MembershipRoles: `"MEMBER"`.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1De.description: Resource representing a user's use of a Device

managementState.description: Output only. Management state of the user on the device.
enumDescriptions: Default value. This value is unused.
This user's data and profile is being removed from the device.
This user's data and profile is removed from the device.
User is approved to access data on the device.
User is blocked from accessing data on the device.

User is unenrolled from Advanced Windows Management, but the Windows
account is still intact.

compromisedState.description: Compromised State of the DeviceUser object
enumDescriptions: Compromised state of Device User account is unknown or unspecified.
Device User Account is not compromised.

lastSyncTime.description: Output only. Last time when user synced with policies.

userAgent.description: Output only. User agent on the device for this specific user

firstSyncTime.description: Output only. Most recent time when user registered with this service.

languageCode.description: Output only. Default locale used on device, in IETF BCP-47 format.

passwordState.description: Password state of the DeviceUser object

userEmail.description: Email address of the user registered on the device.

name.description:
Output only. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of
the DeviceUser in format: `devices/{device_id}/deviceUsers/{user_id}`,
where user_id is the ID of the user associated with the user session.

EntityKey.description:
An EntityKey uniquely identifies an Entity. Namespaces are used to provide
isolation for IDs. A single ID can be reused across namespaces but the
combination of a namespace and an ID must be unique.

id.description:
The ID of the entity within the given namespace. The ID must be unique
within its namespace.

namespace.description:
Namespaces provide isolation for IDs, so an ID only needs to be unique
within its namespace.

Namespaces are currently only created as part of IdentitySource creation
from Admin Console. A namespace `"identitysources/{identity_source_id}"` is
created corresponding to every Identity Source `identity_source_id`.

name.description:
[Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Group in the format: `groups/{group_id}`, where `group_id` is the unique ID
assigned to the Group.

deviceUser.description: Resultant DeviceUser object for the action.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Wi.description: Response message for wiping the user's account from the device.

nextPageToken.description:
Token to retrieve the next page of results, or empty if there are no
more results available for listing.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Ca.description: Response message for cancelling an unfinished device wipe.

device.description:
Resultant Device object for the action. Note that asset tags will not be
returned in the device object.

nextPageToken.description:
Token to retrieve the next page of results. Empty if there are no more
results.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Li.description: Response message that is returned in LRO result of ListDeviceUsers Operation.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Wi.description: Response message for wiping all data on the device.

device.description:
Resultant Device object for the action. Note that asset tags will not be
returned in the device object.

description.description:
An extended description to help users determine the purpose of a Group. For
example, you can include information about who should join the Group, the
types of messages to send to the Group, links to FAQs about the Group, or
related Groups. Maximum length is 4,096 characters.

parent.description:
Required. Immutable. The entity under which this Group resides in Cloud Identity resource
hierarchy. Must be set when creating a Group, read-only afterwards.

Currently allowed types: `identitysources`.

labels.description:
Required. `Required`. Labels for Group resource.
For creating Groups under a namespace, set label key to
'labels/system/groups/external' and label value as empty.

createTime.description:
Output only. The time when the Group was created.
Output only.

updateTime.description:
Output only. The time when the Group was last updated.
Output only.

name.description:
Output only. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Group in the format: `groups/{group_id}`, where group_id is the unique ID
assigned to the Group.

Must be left blank while creating a Group.

groupKey.description:
Required. Immutable. EntityKey of the Group.

Must be set when creating a Group, read-only afterwards.

Operation.description:
This resource represents a long-running operation that is the result of a
network API call.

response.description:
The normal response of the operation in case of success.  If the original
method returns no data on success, such as `Delete`, the response is
`google.protobuf.Empty`.  If the original method is standard
`Get`/`Create`/`Update`, the response should be the resource.  For other
methods, the response should have the type `XxxResponse`, where `Xxx`
is the original method name.  For example, if the original method name
is `TakeSnapshot()`, the inferred response type is
`TakeSnapshotResponse`.

additionalProperties.description: Properties of the object. Contains field @type with type URL.

name.description:
The server-assigned name, which is only unique within the same service that
originally returns it. If you use the default HTTP mapping, the
`name` should be a resource name ending with `operations/{unique_id}`.

error.description: The error result of the operation in case of failure or cancellation.

metadata.description:
Service-specific metadata associated with the operation.  It typically
contains progress information and common metadata such as create time.
Some services might not provide such metadata.  Any method that returns a
long-running operation should document the metadata type, if any.

additionalProperties.description: Properties of the object. Contains field @type with type URL.

done.description:
If the value is `false`, it means the operation is still in progress.
If `true`, the operation is completed, and either `error` or `response` is
available.

Status.description:
The `Status` type defines a logical error model that is suitable for
different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs. It is
used by [gRPC](https://github.com/grpc). Each `Status` message contains
three pieces of data: error code, error message, and error details.

You can find out more about this error model and how to work with it in the
[API Design Guide](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/errors).

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of google.rpc.Code.

message.description:
A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any
user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the
google.rpc.Status.details field, or localized by the client.

details.description:
A list of messages that carry the error details.  There is a common set of
message types for APIs to use.

additionalProperties.description: Properties of the object. Contains field @type with type URL.

nextPageToken.description:
Token to retrieve the next page of results, or empty if there are no
more results available for listing.

groups.description:
Groups returned in response to list request.
The results are not sorted.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Li.description: Response message for listing all apps on the device.

endpointApps.description: The list of matching EndpointApps found as a result of the request.

nextPageToken.description:
Token to retrieve the next page of results. Empty if there are no more
results.

lastSyncTime.description: Most recent time when device synced with this service.

serialNumber.description: Serial Number of device. Example: HT82V1A01076.

brand.description: Output only. Device brand. Example: Samsung.

osVersion.description: Output only. OS version of the device. Example: Android 8.1.0.

createTime.description:
Output only. When the Company-Owned device was imported. This field is empty for BYOD
devices.

ownerType.description: Whether the device is owned by the company or an individual
enumDescriptions: Default value. The value is unused.
Bring Your Own Device (i.e. individual owns the device)

model.description: Output only. Model name of device. Example: Pixel 3.

imei.description: Output only. IMEI number of device if GSM device; empty otherwise.

managementState.description: Output only. Management state of the device
enumDescriptions: Default value. This value is unused.

The device is not provisioned. Device will start from this state until
some action is taken (i.e. a user starts using the device).
Data and settings on the device are being removed.
All data and settings on the device are removed.

meid.description: Output only. MEID number of device if CDMA device; empty otherwise.

networkOperator.description: Output only. Mobile or network operator of device, if available.

enumDescriptions: Device is a Google Sync device.

name.description:
Output only. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names)
of the Device in format: `devices/{device_id}`, where device_id is
the unique id assigned to the Device.

releaseVersion.description: Output only. OS release version. Example: 6.0.

androidSpecificAttributes.description: Output only. Attributes specific to Android devices.

compromisedState.description: Output only. Represents whether the Device is compromised.
enumDescriptions:
The device is compromised (currently, this means Android device is
rooted).
The device is safe (currently, this means Android device is unrooted).

manufacturer.description: Output only. Device manufacturer. Example: Motorola.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1An.description: Resource representing the Android specific attributes of a Device.

supportsWorkProfile.description:
Whether device supports Android work profiles. If false, this service
will not block access to corp data even if an administrator turns on the
"Enforce Work Profile" policy.

enabledUnknownSources.description: Whether applications from unknown sources can be installed on device.

ownerProfileAccount.description:
Whether this account is on an owner/primary profile.
For phones, only true for owner profiles. Android 4+ devices
can have secondary or restricted user profiles.

enabledDeveloperOptions.description: Whether developer options is enabled on device.

enumDescriptions: Active device administrator privileges on the device.

Profile Owner privileges.
The account is in a managed corporate profile.
Device Owner privileges on the device.

securityPatchTime.description: OS security patch update time on device.

enabledUsbDebugging.description: Whether adb (USB debugging) is enabled on device.

otherAccounts.description:
Domain name for Google accounts on device. Type for other accounts on
device. Will only be populated if |ownership_privilege| is
|PROFILE_OWNER| or |DEVICE_OWNER|. Does not include the account signed in
to the device policy app if that account's domain has only one account.
Examples: "com.example", "xyz.com".

Membership.description: Resource representing a Membership within a Group

name.description:
Output only. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Membership in the format: `groups/{group_id}/memberships/{member_id}`,
where group_id is the unique ID assigned to the Group to which Membership
belongs to, and member_id is the unique ID assigned to the member

Must be left blank while creating a Membership.

preferredMemberKey.description:
Required. Immutable. EntityKey of the entity to be added as the member. Must be set while
creating a Membership, read-only afterwards.

Currently allowed entity types: `Users`, `Groups`.

createTime.description: Output only. Creation timestamp of the Membership. Output only.

updateTime.description: Output only. Last updated timestamp of the Membership. Output only.

roles.description:
Roles for a member within the Group.

Currently supported MembershipRoles: `"MEMBER"`.

deviceUser.description: Resultant DeviceUser object for the action.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Ca.description: Response message for cancelling an unfinished user account wipe.

name.description:
[Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Membership being looked up.

Format: `groups/{group_id}/memberships/{member_id}`, where `group_id` is
the unique ID assigned to the Group to which Membership belongs to, and
`member_id` is the unique ID assigned to the member.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Bl.description: Response message for blocking the device from accessing user data.

deviceUser.description: Resultant DeviceUser object for the action.

nextPageToken.description:
Token to retrieve the next page of results, or empty if there are no
more results available for specified query.

groups.description: List of Groups satisfying the search query.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Li.description: Response message that is returned in LRO result of ListDevices Operation.

nextPageToken.description:
Token to retrieve the next page of results. Empty if there are no more
results.

GoogleAppsCloudidentityDevicesV1alpha1Ap.description: Response message for approving the device to access user data.

deviceUser.description: Resultant DeviceUser object for the action.

permissions.description: Output only. Names of all permissions granted to the installed app

name.description:
Output only. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of
the EndpointApp in format:
`devices/{device}/deviceUsers/{device_user}/endpointApps/{endpoint_app}`,
where client_app_id is the ID of the app associated with the Device.

packageName.description: Output only. Full package name of the installed app

versionName.description: Output only. Version name of the installed app

versionCode.description: Output only. Version code of the installed app

displayName.description: Output only. Name of the app displayed to the user

https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-id.description: See any Cloud Identity Groups that you can access, including group members and their emails

https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-pl.description: View and manage your data across Google Cloud Platform services

name: cloudidentity
title: Cloud Identity API

name.description:
Required. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Group in the format: `groups/{group_id}`, where `group_id` is the unique ID
assigned to the Group.

Output only. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Group in the format: `groups/{group_id}`, where group_id is the unique ID
assigned to the Group.

Must be left blank while creating a Group.

Required. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Group in the format: `groups/{group_id}`, where `group_id` is the unique ID
assigned to the Group.

pageToken.description: The next_page_token value returned from a previous list request, if any.

pageSize.description:
The default page size is 200 (max 1000) for the BASIC view, and 50
(max 500) for the FULL view.

view.description: Group resource view to be returned. Defaults to [View.BASIC]().

parent.description: Required. Customer ID to list all groups from.

list.description: Lists groups within a customer or a domain.

groupKey.namespace.description:
Namespaces provide isolation for IDs, so an ID only needs to be unique
within its namespace.

Namespaces are currently only created as part of IdentitySource creation
from Admin Console. A namespace `"identitysources/{identity_source_id}"` is
created corresponding to every Identity Source `identity_source_id`.

groupKey.id.description:
The ID of the entity within the given namespace. The ID must be unique
within its namespace.

lookup.description:
Looks up [resource
name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of a Group by
its EntityKey.

query.description:
Required. `Required`. Query string for performing search on groups. Users can search
on parent and label attributes of groups.
EXACT match ('==') is supported on parent, and CONTAINS match ('in') is
supported on labels.

view.description: Group resource view to be returned. Defaults to [View.BASIC]().

pageToken.description: The next_page_token value returned from a previous search request, if any.

pageSize.description:
The default page size is 200 (max 1000) for the BASIC view, and 50
(max 500) for the FULL view.

name.description:
Required. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Membership to be deleted.

Format: `groups/{group_id}/memberships/{member_id}`, where `group_id` is
the unique ID assigned to the Group to which Membership belongs to, and
member_id is the unique ID assigned to the member.

Required. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Membership to be retrieved.

Format: `groups/{group_id}/memberships/{member_id}`, where `group_id` is
the unique id assigned to the Group to which Membership belongs to, and
`member_id` is the unique ID assigned to the member.

pageToken.description: The next_page_token value returned from a previous list request, if any.

pageSize.description:
The default page size is 200 (max 1000) for the BASIC view, and 50
(max 500) for the FULL view.

view.description: Membership resource view to be returned. Defaults to View.BASIC.

parent.description:
Required. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Group to list Memberships within.

Format: `groups/{group_id}`, where `group_id` is the unique ID assigned to
the Group.

Required. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Group to create Membership within. Format: `groups/{group_id}`, where
`group_id` is the unique ID assigned to the Group.

memberKey.id.description:
The ID of the entity within the given namespace. The ID must be unique
within its namespace.

memberKey.namespace.description:
Namespaces provide isolation for IDs, so an ID only needs to be unique
within its namespace.

Namespaces are currently only created as part of IdentitySource creation
from Admin Console. A namespace `"identitysources/{identity_source_id}"` is
created corresponding to every Identity Source `identity_source_id`.

parent.description:
Required. [Resource name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of the
Group to lookup Membership within.

Format: `groups/{group_id}`, where `group_id` is the unique ID assigned to
the Group.

lookup.description:
Looks up [resource
name](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names) of a Membership
within a Group by member's EntityKey.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

description: API for provisioning and managing identity resources.
